title: Can I get a copy of a video clip I saw on Reuters.com or uk.reuters.com?
text:
Reuters does not resell or license the video content after it is removed from our site and it is not available for download. If you are a professional television or film maker and want access to Reuters archive video for your own commercial projects, please contact sales@itnarchive.com.

You can also embed a single Reuters video clip onto your blog or website, by copying the "embed" code located next to each video on all Reuters sites.



Reuters news and video is available through the Reuters RSS service. With Reuters RSS you can take Reuters world class news and television headlines, free of charge, and incorporate them into your preferred newsreaders and web logs.
